page.title: 12HEALTH CARE
page.content: THERE ARE THREE HEALTH SURGERIES IN GROVE.THERE ARE TWO DENTISTS SURGERIES AND ONE DOCTORS SURGERY.THE DENTIST USES SPECIAL EQUIPMENT TO CLEAN PEOPLES TEETH.A FREE SIX MONTHLY CHECK UP IS PAID FOR BY THE NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE.ANY TREATMENT HAS TO BE PAID FOR UNLESS YOU ARE YOUNG (UNDER 16),OLD (RETIRED),UNEMPLOYED,LOW PAID OR PREGNANT.THE DENTIST IS NEAR THE FARM. THE DOCTOR TAKES CARE OF PEOPLE IF THEY ARE ILL.IF A PERSON IS ILL THEY EITHER COME TO THE DOCTORS OR THE DOCTOR COMES TO THEM.THE MOST COMMON ILLNESSES FOR ADULTS ARE TUMMY BUGS,CHRONIC COMPLAINTS AND COLDS.THE DOCTORS IS NEAR THE SHOPS.THERE IS ALSO A KEEP-FIT CLUB WHERE PEOPLE GO TO EXERCISE.THEY EXERCISE TO MUSIC.OLD PEOPLE GO ASWELL.IT IS IN THE GROVE CENTRE.BY MATTHEW SIMON AND CLAIRE.
